kv4.3:1.3: Maggo phalaṁ nibbānaṁ, sotāpattimaggo sotāpattiphalaṁ, sakadāgāmimaggo sakadāgāmiphalaṁ, anāgāmimaggo anāgāmiphalaṁ, arahattamaggo arahattaphalaṁ, satipaṭṭhānaṁ sammappadhānaṁ iddhipādo indriyaṁ balaṁ bojjhaṅgoti?
kv4.3:2.7: Maggo phalaṁ nibbānaṁ, sotāpattimaggo sotāpattiphalaṁ …pe… bojjhaṅgoti?
kv4.3:3.8: Maggo phalaṁ nibbānaṁ, sotāpattimaggo sotāpattiphalaṁ …pe… bojjhaṅgoti?
kv4.3:4.3: Arahato kāyo paggahaniggahupago chedanabhedanupago kākehi gijjhehi kulalehi sādhāraṇoti?
kv4.3:4.5: Anāsavo dhammo paggahaniggahupago chedanabhedanupago kākehi gijjhehi kulalehi sādhāraṇoti?
kv4.3:5.1: Arahato kāye visaṁ kameyya, satthaṁ kameyya, aggi kameyyāti?
kv4.3:5.3: Anāsave dhamme visaṁ kameyya, satthaṁ kameyya, aggi kameyyāti?
kv4.3:6.1: Labbhā arahato kāyo addubandhanena bandhituṁ, rajjubandhanena bandhituṁ, saṅkhalikabandhanena bandhituṁ, gāmabandhanena bandhituṁ, nigamabandhanena bandhituṁ, nagarabandhanena bandhituṁ, janapadabandhanena bandhituṁ, kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi bandhitunti?
kv4.3:6.3: Labbhā anāsavo dhammo addubandhanena bandhituṁ, rajjubandhanena bandhituṁ, saṅkhalikabandhanena bandhituṁ, gāmanigamanagarajanapadabandhanena bandhituṁ, kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi bandhitunti?
kv4.3:7.1: Yadi arahā puthujjanassa cīvaraṁ deti, anāsavaṁ hutvā sāsavaṁ hotīti?
kv4.3:8.1: Yadi arahā puthujjanassa piṇḍapātaṁ deti, senāsanaṁ deti, gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ deti, anāsavo hutvā sāsavo hotīti?
kv4.3:9.1: Yadi puthujjano arahato cīvaraṁ deti, sāsavaṁ hutvā anāsavaṁ hotīti?
kv4.3:10.1: Yadi puthujjano arahato piṇḍapātaṁ deti, senāsanaṁ deti, gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ deti, sāsavo hutvā anāsavo hotīti?
kv4.3:11.6: Hañci arahā anāsavo, tena vata re vattabbe—
